attributes.action: Put Stonehenge into special measures Remove Stonehenge from EH Management
attributes.additional_details: They have rejected the advice and concerns of UNESCO, Senior Archaeologists, Historians, Druids, and Environmentalists. This shows they are not fit to manage the 'Jewel in the Crown' of a World Heritage site.
attributes.background: Since splitting with Historic England, English Heritage has commercialized Stonehenge to the extreme introducing a 'Pay to Pray' Policy at Solstices and priced Tourism out of reach for the General Public to whom it was left, and supported unsuitable road improvements in the World Heritage site.
